dialog: You're not saying things that mean anything.
Ain't no way you can say to me a Lincoln is better than a Cadillac.
A Lincoln is better. It's a better automobile.
It's got more legroom for your legs.
You just said, "More power. "  You're starting to repeat yourself.
He got me so fucking aggravated.
I'll tell you one thing, Mercedes got it all over both of them.
A Lincoln's like driving a fucking water bed, for Christ's sakes.
I'll tell you one thing, my friend.
Longer like my dick is longer?
No, no, no. We're not talking about a Volkswagen.
What do you mean? Yeah, Volkswagen.
You don't make no fucking sense.
This is a car, this is a car, right?
All things being equal, the one's longer gonna get there first.
You don't have to be fucking Einstein to understand this.
You know what happens when you get there, don't you?
You're still driving a fucking Lincoln.
I'll show you a fucking picture.
Two cars. The one's longer gets there first.
That's a scientific fact. It's a longer car.
Can I ask you guys something?
Are you guys, you know, wise guys?
Wise guys? What are wise guys?
What makes you think we're wise guys?
The guy by the bar with the mustache.
Not that fucking hump Jilly "Foureyes. " Jilly, you know, from Queens.
You think he's a wise guy?
Connected? If I had a thing to lay off, he could lay it off for me?
You got something you gotta lay off?
You got something you gotta lay off?
I'm just saying if I had a thing, he could lay it off. That's all.
All that fucking money you owe downtown, you'd have to lay off a fucking Brink's truck.
I think fucking Lefty's in love.
Go back to sleep. I'll call you tomorrow.
Okay. I'm sorry. I gotta go back to sleep.
Put the phone on your pillow.
I want to listen to you breathe.
Why don't you give it to your wife?
My wife? How am I gonna give it to my wife?
I'm asking you to middle a diamond for me here.
All I want from my end is $8,000.
And I'm saying to you is you should give it to somebody that don't know better, because that's a fugazy.
How do you know it's a fugazy?
You looked at it for two seconds.
I know what a fugazy is.
Hey, pal, you want to see something?
There you go. Ain't that something?
Yeah, that is a beautiful thing, but it's not my thing.
What do you want me to say?
Go ahead, try and sell it, you want to be a dumbsky. Give it a shot.
Dumbsky? You calling me a dumbsky?
You know who you're talking to, my friend?
Hey, Left. Come on, have a spritzer.
You want to go embarrass yourself with this thing...
Embarrass myself? My family, my children...
My mother can hold her head up in any neighborhood in this city when she walks down the block, see?
In all the five boroughs, I'm known.
I'm known all over the fucking world.
Anybody, ask anybody about Lefty from Mulberry Street.
You're pissing up the wrong fucking tree.
Where you going? Sit down there.
You're gonna walk out on me?
You don't walk out on me.
Let's go get your car. Come on.
I'm getting fucking cancer over here.
Don't ask so many fucking questions.
Well, well, I've got to school you, my friend. I've got to school you.
What's the matter? You work for Jilly, he never school you?
You don't talk until I talk to you.
You call that ring a fugazy. You don't know word fucking one, my friend.
I know. I look at you and I know.
You a guy can't keep his fucking mouth shut.
Hey, I'm talking to you now.
Look, I've been in jewels five years.
How do you figure I'm gonna earn the kind of money I do if I can't tell a fucking zircon?
Yeah. If you know what you're doing, there is.
Let's go to 23rd and 8th. Then we'll find out if you know what you're doing.
No, hold on. Wait. I gave you the diamond.
Don't you tell me what I know.
You know what you did, pal.
One of you has got to be wrong.
Left, that is my wife's fucking diamond ring.
You took away your wife's ring?
Look, you bring that ring to any kike on 47th Street, he's gonna tell you that that is primo.
You took away your wife's ring to go bet on the Giants?
Hey, look, you don't want it.
Give it back to me, okay?
Let me talk to this fucking guy for a second.
Just give me half a second, would you?
Why don't you go to the bar and have a drink?
Let me talk to the guy for a minute.
Hey, I got a fucking black belt, pal. So you...
This guy is going to fucking kill you.
We got about two minutes to figure a way out of this thing.
You're sorry? Shut the fuck up.
What kind of car do you drive?
That's for the fucking drinks, pal.
Why'd you pay for that drink, Don?
A wise guy never pays for a drink.
I got 26 fucking hits under my belt, and you're the one he's scared of. Fuck.
Pull over. I've got to do something.
Come on, give me a hand with this.
You're taking the whole fucking thing apart.
You didn't hear nothing under the dash?
No, I didn't hear a fucking thing.
I can go right up the back.
What the fuck are you doing down there?
You think I got a wire in my car?
Did I say that? Did I say you got a wire?
Say it to my face, if you're gonna do this.
Nothing for nothing, but I think you owe me an apology.
Come on. You lost a screwdriver in my fucking stereo?
You'll find it again. It's down there.
Yeah. I got the Fleetwood Brougham.
Is that right? With the velor?
I got a girl out there in California.
Keep your eye out for your balls.
Even when he's wrong, he's right.
All the way up the line, connected guy to wise guy to skipper to boss.
It's kind of like the army, like a chain of command.
The army? It ain't nothing like the army.
The army is some guy you don't know sends you out to whack some other guy you don't know. Army.
You want to check in with me tomorrow?
I don't know how the fuck you knew that ring was a fugazy.
Don the Jeweler is a good earner.
He keeps to himself. He's a jewel guy.
Wherever the fuck the Dodgers have spring training.
I said I knew him, Left.
I didn't say I fucked him.
What do you say, Jilly? How you doing?
My friend Lefty's asking about you.
I wouldn't do that to you.
Because if you do, one of us is gonna whack you out.
All right, Jilly. Go back to your bath.
When I introduce you, I'm gonna say, "This is a friend of mine. " That means you're a connected guy.
If I said instead, "This is a friend of ours," that would mean you're a made guy.
Yeah, "friend of mine. " "Friend of ours. "  What do I call you? "Friend of ours," or...
You keep your mouth shut about me.
Know what I'm saying? Hey, Don.
You got a couple of fazools?
I got some things I got to take care of.
A wise guy don't carry his money in a wallet.
A wise guy carries money in a roll.
Beaner on the outside. Like that. Come on.
You got to get rid of that mustache, 'cause that's against the rules.
And get a pair of pants, will you?
Dress like I dress. This is my family.
More even than my own family.
I grew up in an orphanage.
Ain't the question, even if you had a family.
If this is your family, then this is your family.
What do we got to be standing outside all day in the cold for?
This is Donnie, a friend of mine.
The good news is my dick is now a popsicle.
This is Donnie, a friend of mine.
Just stand there and look dangerous, friend.
He does look dangerous, don't he?
You gonna make this week's vig? I hope so.
'Cause I don't want to have to come looking for you. You hear me?
I just shit in my pants, right?
Okay, Joe, the Bureau wants your autograph.
What's that, you want me to sign it?
Listen, by the way, they want you to shave the mustache. Regulations.
How did they even know about the mustache?
So does he. He wants me to shave.
I got him. I got my hooks in the guy.
Cloaked by the high grasses of the African Savannah, the stalking cheetah moves stealthily towards his prey.
Benny's watching TV. You met Tommy?
Separated from the herd, the gazelle senses danger.
I'll be in the kitchen if you need me.
The endless cycle of nature repeated.
I brought this by for you.
I'm sorry, Left, but I'm in a little bit of a rush here, you know? So...
I thought you was an orphan.
So what are you gonna do?
Left, I don't want to spoil your day.
No man of mine is gonna be alone on Christmas. Come on in here.

All they know is manicotti. A hundred years, they'll be eating manicotti.
You never ate coq au vin?
Can of collagen, can of tomatoes.
No, you said "punch. " Sometimes you don't make no fucking sense, Donnie.
I can't cook special like Benny.

What the fuck is that? Annette, get that.
One broad, that's enough for anyone.

Yeah, you, too. Take it easy.
My own fucking son's a junkie.
Give him a smack in the mouth once in a while.

You don't know the worries I got, Donnie.
A woman like Annette, I can't do right by her. I ain't got $3 in my pocket.
I put a bet on a horse, that horse don't do what it's supposed to do, like every fucking thing else in my life.
I got cancer of the prick.
My exwife lives in this building.
I run into her in the elevator.
I got to have three spritzers afterward just to calm down after I see her.

I'm in the medical books for that.
I got this boat, too, this Bertram.
I had to get rid of it for money I owe Sonny Red.
The vig alone is $3,000 a week.
I'd like to put a dent in that guy's head.
No, you don't do that, Donnie.
I know. I'm saying I wish I could.
A guy like you doesn't touch a made guy.
You know what I did yesterday?
I went in front of all the skippers.
That cocksucker Sonny Red, all of them.
I went on the record with you.
You do? You ain't got no fucking idea, my friend.
Nobody can touch you now. I'm your man.
Jesus Christ couldn't touch you, because I represent you.
So keep your nose clean, be a good earner, follow the rules, and who knows, maybe one day when they open the books, you get straightened out.
A made guy. Come on, lift your glass.
Thanks a lot. It was excellent.
Could you spot me a couple hundred?
I'll get it back to you. You got it here.
I'll get back to you on this.
Look what the reindeer dragged in.
I was working. Nothing I could do.
Christmas, they can't wait up for their father.
Is that your way of saying you're sorry?
Only be sure to introduce yourself.
They might think you're the Fuller brush man.
If you knew what I was doing today...
I don't have an idea  because you don't tell me, remember?
Because it's for your own protection.
As if any of this is for me.
Good. Then don't say it like it's nothing.
It's not nothing, but it's not a husband.
A lot of women would disagree with you.
Is that what you do with all your time?
Conduct polls with all your women?
I'm not even gonna dignify that.
Seven days a week, I'm out there busting my ass, and this is the shit I come home to.
You said it was gonna be three months.
How do you find anything in here?
You got cereal on three shelves.
Put stuff away for once. It's my job.
Christmas Day you don't show up, so Mommy puts on the Santa suit.
It would be easier if you tell me...
...what goes on with these guys, what you do.

Why don't you go pick them up?

Okay it? What do you think?

I'll bet he's on the wrestling team.

What am I gonna do? We'll see.

I'll make a bet with you.
I'll bet you $20 that you can't get through this entire meal without saying three words.

Let's just, let's read a book.

Yeah, that's what I said. I'm checking in.

Every morning you're reading the paper.

Not here, I'm saying after the bridge.

He's got a mistress for the mistress.
I watched out for them, all of them.
Me, I was the only one.
Two hundred fazools, week in, week out.

You think I don't know that?

This is a fucking deformed Creature from the Black Lagoon's claw I got here.
Love on the rocks ain't no surprise  Paulie, that ain't gin.
What are you talking? You got two sevens.
I know I had three sevens.
You know you had three sevens?
From now on, I'll deal out the cards, you say "gin" whenever you feel like it.
Fucking booths. $200 in action and what we have we got, five?

Let's go for a ride. I got a new car.
Can you believe the ride on this car?
I can't understand how they lost a war, them Germans.

What's it look like I'm doing?

Christ, I think I shit my pants. What is this?

How many times I stood up to the boss himself, that cocksucker.

Do I get upped? No, they pass me by.

Of course he was in on whacking the boss.

Come on, Left, I'm on your side.
You're on my side because I say you're on my side.
Don't get on your fucking high horse, Donnie.
I wish I had that boat again, that Bertram.
I wish I had that boat.
I'd get in my car with Annette, I'd drive down to the pier I'd get on that boat and I'd go.
East, west, north, south, nobody'd ever find me.
Look at this thing. It's a fucking insult.
He was a friend of mine.
Broad daylight. I can't believe it.

All right, all right, all right.

I swear to you, Donnie, something is going on you don't know about.

I see you siding up to Sonny Black.

I don't know what I would do if you did something wrong.
